                        size
                    }
                    // console.log('Lấy tồn kho với: ', data)
                    $.ajax({
                        headers: {
                            "X-CSRF-TOKEN": $('meta[name="csrf-token"]').attr(
                                "content"
                            ),
                        },
                        url: "/products/getStoreHave",
                        type: "post",
                        data: data,
                        success: function(out) {
                            if (out['totalProduct'] !== 0) {
                                document.querySelector(".situation").innerHTML =
                                    `<span class="available text-blink ">Còn hàng</span><input type="hidden" name="storeHave" value="${out['totalProduct']}"><input type="hidden" name="inCart" value="${out['inCart']}">`;

                                if(slug == "loc-luu-niem-lnloc" || slug == "tai-luu-niem-lntai" || slug == "vang-mieng-24k-kimnguyenbao"){
                                    const button = document.querySelector(".action button.buy-now");
                                    document.querySelectorAll(".action .btn_order").forEach(e => {
                                        e.classList.add('disable');
                                        button.innerHTML = '<span style="margin-top: 10px;">Mua tại cửa hàng</span><span></span>';
                                    });
                                } else {
                                    document.querySelector(".action button.buy-now")
                                        .innerHTML =
                                        '<span>Mua ngay</span><span>(Giao nhanh từ 2 giờ hoặc nhận tại cửa hàng)</span>';

                                    document.querySelector(".action button.buy-now")
                                        .classList.remove('preorder');

                                    document.querySelectorAll(".action").forEach(button => {
                                        button.classList.remove('hidden');
                                    });
                                    document.querySelectorAll(".action .btn_order").forEach(e => {
                                        e.classList.remove('disable');
                                    });
                                }
                            } else {
                                document.querySelector(".situation").innerHTML =
                                    '<span class="pre-oder text-blink">Hết hàng</span>';

                                const button = document.querySelector(".action button.buy-now");
                                button.innerHTML = 
                                    '<span>Đặt mới</span><span>(Thời gian nhận hàng từ 7 đến 10 ngày làm việc)</span>';
                                if (button.dataset.preorder !== "1") {
                                    document.querySelectorAll(".action .btn_order").forEach(e => {
                                        e.classList.add('disable');
                                        button.innerHTML = 
                                    '<span style="margin-top: 10px;">Hết Hàng</span><span></span>';
                                    });
                                } else {
                                    document.querySelectorAll(".action .btn_order").forEach(e => {
                                        e.classList.remove('disable');
                                    });
                                }

                                document.querySelector(".action button.buy-now")
                                    .classList.add('preorder');

                                // const buttons = document.querySelectorAll(
                                //     'button.btn_add_to_installment');
                                // buttons.forEach(button => {
                                //     button.classList.add('disable');
                                // });
                            }

                            if (out['totalStore'] !== 0) {
                                document.querySelector('button.btn_find_store')
                                    .classList.remove(
                                        'disable');
                            } else {
                                document.querySelector('button.btn_find_store')
                                    .classList.add(
                                        'disable');
                            }
                        },
                        complete: function() {
                            // document.getElementById('loading').style.display = 'none';
                        }
                    });
                }
            },

            closeStoreSearch: function() {
                $('.modalSearchStoreClose').on('click', function(e) {
                    console.log("akjshdas!!");
                    e.preventDefault();
                    document.getElementById("modalCartSearch").innerHTML = "";
                });
            },
            initFindStore: function() {
                let Root = this;
                $(".btn_find_store").on("click", function(event) {
                    fbq('track', 'FindLocation');
                    var activeElement = document.querySelector('#color .active');
                    event.preventDefault();
                    if (activeElement == undefined) {
                        activeElement = document.querySelector('#option .colorArea .active');
                    }
                    if (activeElement) {
                        var sizeActive = document.querySelector('#size .active');
                        if (sizeActive) {
                            var size = sizeActive.dataset.size;
                        } else {
                            sizeActive = document.querySelector(`#size-${Root.idActive} .active`);
                            if (sizeActive) {
                                var size = sizeActive.dataset.size;
                            } else {
                                var size = '';
                            }
                        }

                        console.log("fighting size::::", size);
                        var color = activeElement.dataset.color;
                        var id = activeElement.dataset.pid;
                        var slug = App.product.slug;
                        $.ajax({
                            headers: {
                                "X-CSRF-TOKEN": $('meta[name="csrf-token"]').attr(
                                    "content"
                                ),
                            },
                            url: "/api/huythanh/initFindStore",
                            type: "GET",
                            data: {
                                id,
                                color,
                                slug,
                                size,
                            },
                            success: function(output) {
                                document.getElementById("modalCartSearch").innerHTML =
                                    output;
                                App.addressCondition.init()
                                Root.closeStoreSearch();
                            },
                        });
                    }
                });
            },
            // citySelect: function() {
            //     Root = this;
            //     var mySelect = document.getElementById('city');
            //     mySelect.addEventListener('change', function() {
            //         var city = this.value;
            //         var listItems = document.querySelectorAll('#storeList li');
            //         listItems.forEach(function(item) {
            //             if (!item.classList.contains('hidden')) {
            //                 item.classList.add('hidden');
            //             }
            //         });
            //         listItems = document.querySelectorAll(`#storeList li.local${city}`);

            //         listItems.forEach(function(item) {
            //             if (item.classList.contains('hidden')) {
            //                 item.classList.remove('hidden');
            //             }
            //         });

            //     });
            // },
            setStoreForSet: function(store) {
                // if (store == 1) {
                //     $('#storeArea').css('display', 'block');
                // } else {
                //     $('#storeArea').css('display', 'none');
                // }
            },
            disableStoreForBst: function() {
                var setActive = document.querySelector('#sets .active');
                if (setActive != undefined) {
                    var store = setActive.dataset.store;
                    // if (store == 0) {
                    //     $('#storeArea').css('display', 'none');
                    // }
                }
            },
            init: function() {
                this.getStoreHave();
                this.initFindStore();
                this.disableStoreForBst();
            }
        }
        App.tab = {
            resetTab: function(parentElement) {

                var elements = parentElement.querySelectorAll('.tabBody');
                for (var i = 0; i < elements.length; i++) {
                    elements[i].classList.remove('active');
                }
                var eleHeads = parentElement.querySelectorAll('.tabHead');
                for (var i = 0; i < eleHeads.length; i++) {
                    eleHeads[i].classList.remove('active');
                }
            },
            setActiveTab: function() {
                let Root = this;
                $('.tabHead').on("click", function(e) {
                    e.preventDefault();
                    var currentElement = e.target;

                    var parentElement = e.target.parentNode.parentNode.parentNode;

                    const id = this.dataset.id;
                    Root.resetTab(parentElement);
                    this.classList.add('active');
                    document.getElementById(id).classList.add('active');
                })
            },
            init: function() {
                this.setActiveTab();
            }
        }
        App.slide = {
            slide_product: {},
            slide_thumb_product: {},
            windowWidth: window.innerWidth,
            initialFirst: false,
            initialSlider: [],
            splideInstances: [],

            fantacybox: function() {
                Fancybox.bind("[data-fancybox]", {
                    //
                })
            },
            formatPrice: function(price) {
                if (price > 0) {
                    price = price.toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, '.') + "đ";
                } else {
                    price = "Liên hệ";
                }
                return price;
            },
            activeSlideOrVideo: function(obj, optionName) {
                var sVideo = '';
                var sSlide = '';
                if (obj == 'slide') {
                    sVideo = 'none';
                    sSlide = 'block';
                } else {
                    sVideo = 'block';
                    sSlide = 'block';
                }
                var element = document.getElementById("video-area");
                if (element) {
                    element.style.display = sVideo;
                    element.style.position = 'absolute';
                    element.style.zIndex = '9';
                    var myPlayer = videojs('my-video');
                    if (sVideo == 'block') {
                        console.log("video playing!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!")
                        myPlayer.play();
                    }
                }
                element = document.getElementById(`main-slide-${optionName}`);
                if (element) {
                    element.style.display = sSlide;
                }
            },
            handOptionColor: function() {
                let Root = this;
                $('.btn_color').on('click', function(e) {
                    e.preventDefault()
                    // document.getElementById("storeArea").innerHTML = '';
                    var optionName = e.target.dataset.name
                    var status = e.target.dataset.status
                    if (status != 0) {
                        var elements = document.querySelectorAll('.slide-wrapper');
                        elements.forEach(function(element) {
                            element.style.display = 'none';
                        });
                        var slideId = e.target.dataset.slide;
                        var ele = document.getElementById(slideId);
                        if (ele) {
                            ele.style.display = 'block';
                        }
                        $('#option').find('li .btn_color').removeClass('active')
                        event.target.classList.add('active');
                        Root.initSlideWithVideo();
                        Root.activeSlideOrVideo('slide', optionName);
                    } else {
                        alert("Hiện tại không có hàng cho option này.")
                    }
                    App.store.getStoreHave();

                })
            },
            handOptionSet: function() {
                let Root = this;
                $('.btn_set').on('click', function(e) {
                    e.preventDefault()
                    // $('#option').find('li .btn_color').removeClass('active')
                    e.target.classList.add('active');
                    var slideId = e.target.dataset.slide;
                    var optionName = e.target.dataset.name;
                    var color0 = e.target.dataset.color0;
                    optionName += (color0 != undefined) ? ('-' + color0) : '';
                    console.log(optionName);
                    var elements = document.querySelectorAll('.slide-wrapper');

                    elements.forEach(function(element) {
                        element.style.display = 'none';
                    });
                    var ele = document.getElementById(slideId);
                    ele.style.display = 'block';

                    Root.initSlideWithVideo();
                    Root.activeSlideOrVideo('slide', optionName);

                    if (window.innerWidth < 769) {
                        console.log("active with id::", slideId);
                        const imgCount = $(`#${slideId} ul.splide__list li`).length;
                        $('.video-thumb-area').css('left', `calc(50% - ${imgCount * 5}px - 3px)`);
                        $('.video-thumb-area .play').removeClass("is-active");
                        App.sizeTutorial.init();
                        App.swipe.init();
                    }
                })
            },
            changeSlideByColor: function(color) {
                $.ajax({
                    headers: {
                        "X-CSRF-TOKEN": $('meta[name="csrf-token"]').attr(
                            "content"
                        ),
                    },
                    url: "/products/getStoreHave",
                    type: "post",
                    data: data,
                    success: function(out) {

                    },
                });
            },
            videoActive: function() {
                let Root = this;
                $('.video-thumb-area').on('click', function(e) {
                    e.preventDefault();
                    var color = this.dataset.color;
                    Root.activeSlideOrVideo('video', color);
                    $('.video-thumb-area .play').addClass("is-active");
                    $('.slide-wrapper[style="display: block;"]').find('ul[id^="thumbnail-slide-"] li')
                        .removeClass(
                            "is-active");
                })
            },
            initSlideWithVideo: function() {
                var Root = this;
                var groups = [];
                var elements = document.querySelectorAll('.slide-wrapper');
                elements.forEach(function(element) {
                    var group = element.dataset.group;
                    if (group != undefined && groups.indexOf(group) == -1) {
                        groups.push(group);
                    }
                });
                App.slide.splideInstances.forEach(function(instance) {
                    instance.destroy();
                });
                groups.forEach(element => {
                    var mainID = `#main-slide-${element}`;
                    // if (!App.slide.initialSlider.includes(mainID)) {
                    var thumbID = `#thumbnail-slide-${element}`;
                    if ($(mainID).length > 0) {
                        App.slide.initialSlider.push(mainID);
                        const isLoop = $('#video-area').length == 0;
                        if (window.innerWidth < 700) {
                            var main = new Splide(mainID, {
                                type: 'slide',
                                speed: 1000,
                                rewind: true,
                                pagination: false,
                                lazyLoad: 'nearby',
                                arrows: false,
                            });
                        } else {
                            var main = new Splide(mainID, {
                                type: 'loop',
                                speed: 1000,
                                rewind: true,
                                pagination: false,
                                lazyLoad: 'nearby',
                                arrows: true,
                            });
                        }

                        var thumbnails = new Splide(thumbID, {
                            fixedWidth: 114,
                            fixedHeight: 112,
                            gap: 10,
                            // fixedWidth: 114,
                            // fixedHeight: 112,
                            gap: 10,
                            rewind: isLoop,
                            // speed: 1000,
                            // interval:3000,
                            pagination: false,
                            isNavigation: true,
                            arrows: false,
                            lazyLoad: 'nearby',
                            perMove: 1,
                            // autoplay:true,
                            // arrows: true,
                            breakpoints: {
                                600: {
                                    fixedWidth: 5,
                                    fixedHeight: 5,
                                    gap: 24
                                },
                            },
                        });
                        // App.slide.splideInstances.push(main);
                        // App.slide.splideInstances.push(thumbnails);

                        if ($('#my-video').length > 0) {
                            thumbnails.on('click', function() {
                                document.getElementById('video-area').style.display =
                                    'none';
                                $(mainID).css('display', 'block');
                            });

                            // $('.splide__pagination').on('click', function() {
                            //     document.getElementById('video-area').style.display =
                            //         'none';
                            //     $(mainID).css('display', 'block');
                            // });
                        }

                        main.sync(thumbnails);
                        main.on('mounted', function() {

                            $(`${mainID} .thumb`).css('height', $(`${mainID} .thumb`)
                                .width());
                            // document.getElementById(mainID).style.width = "500px";
                            // document.getElementById(mainID).style.height = "500px";
                            if ($('#my-video').length > 0) {
                                var padding = 0;
                                if (Root.windowWidth < 768) {
                                    padding = 0;
                                }
                                if (Root.windowWidth < 576) {
                                    padding = 3;
                                }
                                var mainWidth = $('#slide').width() - padding;
                                $(`${mainID} .thumb`).css('height', mainWidth);
                                document.getElementById('my-video').style.width = mainWidth;
                                document.getElementById('my-video').style.height =
                                    mainWidth;
                                // $(mainID).css('display', 'none');
                            }

                        });
                        main.mount();
                        thumbnails.mount();
                        this.slide_product = main;
                        this.slide_thumb_product = thumbnails;
                        if ($('#my-video').length > 0) {
                            var myPlayer = videojs('my-video');
                            myPlayer.width($('#slide').width());
                            myPlayer.height($('#slide').width());
                            myPlayer.on('ended', function() {
                                myPlayer.currentTime(
                                    0); // Restart the video from the beginning
                                myPlayer.play(); // Start playing the video
                            });
                        }
                    }
                    // }
                });

                if (!App.slide.initialFirst) {
                    console.log('x', groups[0])
                    if (window.innerWidth < 769) {
                        const imgCount = $(`#slide-for-${groups[0]} ul.splide__list li`).length;
                        $('.video-thumb-area').css('right', `calc(50% - ${imgCount * 8}px - 12px)`);
                        App.slide.initialFirst = true;
                    }
                }
            },
            slideWithVideo: function() {
                let Root = this
                if ($(".splide").length > 0) {
                    this.initSlideWithVideo();
                    this.handOptionColor();
                    this.handOptionSet();
                }

            },
            slideConcern: function() {
                if ($("#slideConcern").length > 0) {
                    var slide = new Splide('#slideConcern', {
                        type: 'loop',
                        speed: 1000,
                        width: '100vw',
                        arrows: true,
                        pagination: true,
                        lazyLoad: 'nearby',
                        autoplay: true,
                        perPage: 4,
                        perMove: 1,
                        gap: '20px',
                        breakpoints: {
                            640: {
                                perPage: 2,
                            },
                            920: {
                                perPage: 3,
                            }
                        }

                    })
                    // slide.on('mounted', function() {
                    //     if ($('.boxProduct8 .thumb').length > 0) {
                    //         // console.log($('.boxProduct8 .thumb').width())
                    //         $('.boxProduct8 .thumb').css('height', $('.boxProduct8 .thumb').width())
                    //     }
                    // });
                    slide.mount();
                }

            },
            slideConcern2: function() {
                if ($("#slideConcern2").length > 0) {
                    var slide = new Splide('#slideConcern2', {
                        type: 'loop',
                        speed: 1000,
                        width: '100vw',
                        arrows: true,
                        pagination: true,
                        lazyLoad: 'nearby',
                        autoplay: true,
                        perPage: 4,
                        perMove: 1,
                        gap: '20px',
                        breakpoints: {
                            640: {
                                perPage: 2,
                            },
                            920: {
                                perPage: 3,
                            }
                        }

                    })
                    slide.on('mounted', function() {
                        if ($('.boxProduct8 .thumb').length > 0) {
                            // console.log($('.boxProduct8 .thumb').width())
                            $('.boxProduct8 .thumb').css('height', $('.boxProduct8 .thumb').width())
                        }
                    });
                    slide.mount();
                }

            },

            init: function() {
                this.slideWithVideo();
                this.slideConcern();
                this.slideConcern2();
                this.videoActive();
            }
        }
        App.view3d = {
            scriptElement: null,
            closeModal: function() {
                $('.modalView3dClose').on('click', function(e) {
                    e.preventDefault();
                    document.getElementById('modalView3d').classList.remove('active');
                });
            },
            view3d: function() {
                let Root = this;
                $('.view3d').on('click', function(e) {
                    e.preventDefault();
                    if (document.getElementById('modalView3d') != null) {
                        document.getElementById('modalView3d').classList.add('active');
                    } else {
                        var file = this.dataset.file;
                        $.ajax({
                            headers: {
                                "X-CSRF-TOKEN": $('meta[name="csrf-token"]').attr(
                                    "content"
                                ),
                            },
                            url: "https://huythanhjewelry.vn/getModalView3d",
                            type: "get",
                            data: {
                                file
                            },
                            success: function(output) {
                                document.getElementById("modalCartArea").innerHTML =
                                    output.modalView3d;

                                Root.scriptElement = document.createElement('script');
                                Root.scriptElement.id = 'view3dScript';
                                Root.scriptElement.textContent = $('#viewScriptArea')
                                    .html();
                                document.body.appendChild(Root.scriptElement);
                                Root.closeModal();
                            },
                        });
                    }



                })
            },
            init: function() {
                this.view3d();
            }
        }
        App.swipe = {
            initialStateSlide: function() {
                $('.slide-wrapper ul[id^="thumbnail-slide-"] li').on('touchmove',
                    function(event) {
                        event.preventDefault();
                    });
                if ($('.video-thumb-area .play').length > 0) {
                    $('.slide-wrapper[style="display: block;"]').find(
                        'ul[id^="thumbnail-slide-"] li').first().removeClass("is-active");
                }
            },
            initIsActiveThumbEvent: function() {
                $('.slide-wrapper[style="display: block;"] ul[id^="thumbnail-slide-"] li').on('click',
                    function() {
                        $('.video-thumb-area .play').removeClass("is-active");
                    })
            },
            activeVideo: function() {
                $('.video-thumb-area').click();
            },
            activeFirstImage: function() {
                const $divElement = $('.slide-wrapper[style="display: block;"]');
                const $firstLiElement = $divElement.find('ul[id^="thumbnail-slide-"] li').first();
                $firstLiElement.click();
                $firstLiElement.addClass("is-active");
                $('.video-thumb-area .play').removeClass("is-active");
                // console.log("$firstLiElement:", $firstLiElement)
            },
            activeLastImage: function() {
                const $divElement = $('.slide-wrapper[style="display: block;"]');
                const $lastLiElement = $divElement.find('ul[id^="thumbnail-slide-"] li').last();
                $lastLiElement.click();
                $lastLiElement.addClass("is-active");
                $('.video-thumb-area .play').removeClass("is-active");
                // console.log("$lastLiElement:", $lastLiElement)
            },
            detectSwipe: function(jElement, leftFunct, rightFunct) {
                var startX, startY, endX, endY;

                jElement.on("touchstart", function(event) {
                    var touch = event.touches[0];
                    startX = touch.clientX;
                    startY = touch.clientY;
                });

                jElement.on("touchmove", function(event) {
                    var touch = event.touches[0];
                    endX = touch.clientX;
                    endY = touch.clientY;
                });

                jElement.on("touchend", function(event) {
                    var diffX = endX - startX;
                    var diffY = endY - startY;

                    if (Math.abs(diffX) > Math.abs(diffY)) {
                        if (diffX > 0) {
                            if (rightFunct) {
                                rightFunct()
                            }
                            // alert("Vuốt phải trên " + selector);
                        } else {
                            if (leftFunct) {
                                leftFunct();
                            }
                            // alert("Vuốt trái trên " + selector);
                        }
                    }
                    startX = 0;
                    startY = 0;
                    endX = 0;
                    endY = 0;
                });
            },
            init: function() {
                App.swipe.initIsActiveThumbEvent();
                App.swipe.detectSwipe($('#video-area'), App.swipe.activeFirstImage, App.swipe.activeLastImage);
                // App.swipe.detectSwipe($('#video-area'), App.swipe.activeLastImage, App.swipe.activeFirstImage);

                const $firstLiElement = $('.slide-wrapper[style="display: block;"]').find(
                    'ul[id^="main-slide-"] li').first();
                const $lastLiElement = $('.slide-wrapper[style="display: block;"]').find(
                    'ul[id^="main-slide-"] li').last();
                App.swipe.detectSwipe($firstLiElement, null, App.swipe.activeVideo);
                App.swipe.detectSwipe($lastLiElement, App.swipe.activeVideo, null);
                // App.swipe.activeVideo();
            }
        }
        App.sizeTutorial = {
            init: function() {
                $('.size-tutorial-source').off('click').on('click', function() {
                    var target = $(this).data('target');
                    $(target).removeClass('hide');
                });

                $('.mp-product-option-size-close').off('click').on('click', function(event) {
                    event.stopPropagation();
                    $(this).parent().parent().addClass('hide');
                });
            }
        }
        App.product.init();
        App.tab.init();
        App.slide.init();
        App.view3d.init();
        App.store.init();
        App.swipe.init();
        App.swipe.initialStateSlide();
        App.sizeTutorial.init();
    }
</script>
    
    <script>
        window.addEventListener('load', function() {
            if (window.matchMedia('(min-width: 768px)').matches) {
                window.scrollTo(0, 110);
            }
        });

        window.addEventListener('pageshow', function(event) {
            if (event.persisted) {
                // The page was loaded from the cache
                window.location.reload();
            }
        });
    </script>

    <script>
        if (typeof AppSuggest == "undefined") {
            const AppSuggest = {};
            AppSuggest.suggest = {
                init: function() {
                    const data = {
                        pid: '1731752857',
                        id: 'product_list_suggestion'
                    };
                    $.ajax({
                        headers: {
                            "X-CSRF-TOKEN": $('meta[name="csrf-token"]').attr(
                                "content"
                            ),
                        },
                        url: "https://huythanhjewelry.vn/api/huythanh/getSingleSuggestionProduct",
                        type: "post",
                        data: data,
                        success: function(out) {
                            console.log('out:', out)
                            try {
                                document.getElementById("product_suggestion").innerHTML = out;
                                if (out){
                                    var slide = new Splide(`#product_list_suggestion`, {
                                        type: 'loop',
                                        speed: 1000,
                                        width: '100vw',
                                        arrows: true,
                                        pagination: true,
                                        lazyLoad: 'nearby',
                                        autoplay: true,
                                        perPage: 5,
                                        perMove: 5,
                                        gap: '20px',
                                        breakpoints: {
                                            640: { perPage: 2, perMove: 2 },
                                            920: { perPage: 3, perMove: 3 }
                                        }
                                    });

                                    slide.on('mounted', function() {
                                        $('.boxProduct8 .thumb').css('height', $('.boxProduct8 .thumb').width());
                                    });
                                    slide.mount();
                                } else {
                                    document.getElementById("product_suggestion").closest('.container').style.display = 'none';
                                }
                            } catch (error) {
                                document.getElementById("product_suggestion").closest('.container').style.display = 'none';
                            }
                        },
                    });
                }
            }
            AppSuggest.suggest.init();
        }
    </script>

    <script>
        $(document).ready(function() {
            // Lấy giá trị data-type từ div
            var typeInfo = $('#usp-image').data('type');
            console.log("Tìm ảnh cho loại")
            // Tải file JSON từ URL
            $.getJSON('/config/usp_images.json', function(data) {
                // Kiểm tra nếu typeInfo tồn tại trong dữ liệu JSON
                if (data[typeInfo] && data[typeInfo].url) {
                    // Thay thế src của ảnh với URL tương ứng
                    $('#usp-image img').attr('src', data[typeInfo].url);
                } else {
                    // Nếu không tìm thấy URL tương ứng, có thể để ảnh mặc định hoặc thông báo
                    console.log("Không tìm thấy ảnh cho loại: " + typeInfo);
                }
            });
        });
    </script>

    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
            const button = document.querySelector('.btn_open_gifts');
            const productGift = document.querySelector('.product_gift.hide-above-500px');

            if (button) {
                button.addEventListener('click', () => productGift?.classList.toggle('active'));
            }
        });
    </script>

    <script>
        $(document).ready(function() {
            const $giftContainer = $('#tabProductGift0');
            const $giftItems = $giftContainer.find('.boxProduct8');
            if ($(window).width() < 768 && $giftItems.length >= 2) {
                new Splide('#tabProductGift0', {
                    type: 'loop',
                    perPage: 2,
                    perMove: 2,
                    autoplay: true,
                    arrows: true,
                    width: '100vw',
                    gap: '0px',
                }).mount();
            } else {
                new Splide('#tabProductGift0', {
                    type: 'slide',
                    perPage: 1,
                    perMove: 1,
                    autoplay: true,
                    arrows: true,
                    width: '100vw',
                    gap: '0px',
                }).mount();
            }
        });
    </script>
    
    <script>
        function selectGrade(grade, slug) {
            // Create a URL object from the current URL
            const url = new URL(window.location.href);
            
            // Set or update the 'grade' query parameter
            url.searchParams.set('grade', grade);
            
            // Redirect to the new URL
            window.location.href = url.toString();
        }
    </script>

                <span id="advance-text"></span>
              </a>
            </li>
            <li class="nav-item">
              <a href="https://github.com/sponsors/Dhruv-Techapps" class="nav-link px-2 text-muted" target="_blank">
                <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="16" height="16" fill="currentColor" class="bi bi-balloon-heart text-danger" viewBox="0 0 16 16">
